title: webdav errors and error log says "original file owner does not exist for share xxx"
body:
hello friends,

first: i wish you all a happy new year!

since i updated from 4.5.4 to 4.5.5 i get strange webdav errors (using goodsync). until version 4.5.4 it worked like a charm...

examples of these errors (logged by goodsync) are:

074209 cannot read folder http://myowncloud.xy/remote.php/webdav/folder/folder/file1: xml parser error 9 at line 2 col 0
074211 cannot read folder http://myowncloud.xy/remote.php/webdav/folder/folder/file5: xml parser error 9 at line 2 col 0
075437 cannot read folder http://myowncloud.xy/remote.php/webdav/folder/folder/file2: xml parser error 2 at line 1 col 0
075443 cannot read folder http://myowncloud.xy/remote.php/webdav/folder/folder/file67: xml parser error 2 at line 1 col 0
075453 cannot read folder http://myowncloud.xy/remote.php/webdav/folder/folder/filecv: xml parser error 2 at line 1 col 0
074217 cannot read folder http://myowncloud.xy/remote.php/webdav/folder/folder/file63: xml parser error 9 at line 2 col 0
074235 cannot read folder http://myowncloud.xy/remote.php/webdav/folder/folder/file3: xml parser error 9 at line 2 col 0
074304 cannot read folder http://myowncloud.xy/remote.php/webdav/folder/folder/file77: xml parser error 9 at line 2 col 0

the affected files are randomly, not every file is affected in every sync-attempt. in other words:

for example: i try to sync and the errors are related to some 4 or 5 files and in the next attempt to sync there are 4-5 *other* files affected, in the next attempt to sync there are another different 4-5 files logged with the error above and so on and so on...

since 4.5.5 i can't sync without getting any errors like them above... :(


don't know, if it's related to this prob, i also got an error, that appeared only once in my oc-log saying:

"error 	share 	original file owner does not exist for share 118"
